TopicTitle: RAGE Train, the mechanical nature of it.

Articles.Content:
Hello evryone, it's time to unviel the latest and greatest of everything! Instead of driving a Hype powered train, I'm now driving a RAGE powered train!

[![07.jpg](http://www.myfavoritetoys.com/autism_include/faces/07.jpg)](http://i1.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/000/305/Duckroll.jpg)

This is the rage train, and it is super awesome m8. (now it's clickable for super-duper-HD-mode)

QUESTIONS:

w y do dis?

i dun no

Is that THomas?

No, it's the Rage Train.

I hate the hype train?

you're now powrng the rage train!
